description: This file contains utility functions and classes related to handling responses, including creating panels, escaping markdown tags, checking cancellation status, updating response data, formatting tool calls, creating paused response panels, and generating response events. It is part of a larger system managing AI or tool execution workflows.

methods.name: create_panel
methods.description: Creates a styled panel with specified content, title, and border style.

methods.name: escape_markdown_tags
methods.description: Escapes special markdown tags in a string based on a set of tags.

methods.name: check_if_run_cancelled
methods.description: Raises an exception if the run response indicates cancellation.

methods.name: update_run_response_with_reasoning
methods.description: Updates the run response with new reasoning steps and messages.

methods.name: format_tool_calls
methods.description: Formats a list of tool execution objects into readable string representations.

methods.name: create_paused_run_response_panel
methods.description: Creates a visual panel indicating the run is paused, with details about required confirmations or inputs.

methods.name: get_paused_content
methods.description: Generates a textual summary of the paused state based on tools' requirements.

methods.name: generator_wrapper
methods.description: Wraps an event into a generator for synchronous iteration.

methods.name: async_generator_wrapper
methods.description: Wraps an event into an asynchronous generator for async iteration.
